titleStmt.title: Mr. Love his funeral sermon, preached by himself on the scaffold on Tower Hill, in the hearing of many thousand people, on Friday the two and twentieth day of this instant August. Divided into three parts; 1. The matter for which he suffered, 2. The cleering or justifying of himself. 3. His exhortation to the people.
titleStmt.author: Love, Christopher, 1618-1651.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
